This individual is experienced within the creative industry and is comfortable with multiple medias—from interactive, to brand campaign, and digital content and has worked with a variety of clients, tones and voice styles and will ensure exceptional results . This position needs someone who is confident as an individual contributor, ready to jump in and take a leadership role when required and embraces collaboration to deliver the best concept and solutions. Our ideal candidate has a substantial portfolio of published creative work and professional writing experience. This person must thrive in a fast-paced work environment and enjoy working on numerous projects at once. But above all, this candidate is a strong writer who can easily adapt to different styles.

The Work:
• Write compelling and creative copy for a variety of platforms and lengths across the funnel—from big idea campaigns and TV spots to long form content eBooks and social media ads
• Demonstrate excellent oral and written communication skills
• Demonstrate excellent presentation skills; comfortable presenting and defending concepts and copy for both internal and client-facing meetings
• Deliver assignments on time while consistently meeting Accenture Song quality standards 
• Demonstrate proficiency in copy style guidelines
• Understand and appreciate the importance of strategy

• Lead and own work, and formulate and develop disruptive ideas with minimal oversight or creative direction
• Lead and mentor junior copywriters and ensure Accenture Song quality standards in all copy deliverables

title: AI Content & Copywriting Internship
description:
About M365Connect

At M365Connect, we're reimagining recruitment by connecting top-tier Microsoft professionals with companies in the DACH region (Germany, Austria, Switzerland). Our clients are hiring managers in need of Microsoft experts. Our candidates are cloud architects, M365 consultants, Azure engineers, and more.

To expand our brand and accelerate our reach, were launching a remote internship for a motivated AI Content & Copywriting Intern someone eager to learn how to create content that speaks to both Microsoft experts and companies hiring them.

What This Internship Is About

This is not just about writing it's about building content systems. Youll learn how to plan, generate, and scale content using AI tools, collaborate with automation engineers, and simulate processes that will power the content machine of a Microsoft-focused recruitment brand.

Youll gain hands-on experience with some of the best tools on the market and be part of shaping M365Connects voice across:
• Blog articles
• Social media
• Lead magnets (whitepapers, slide decks)
• Sales emails
• Website content
• Job postings
• AI-generated visual and video assets

And most importantly youll be challenged to navigate independently, grow fast, and own your learning path.

️ Structure & Expectations
• Duration: 3 - 6 months (performance-based)
• Format: Self-paced internship (flexible hours, fully remote)
• Onboarding: Youll get access to our tools, resources, and team for initial orientation
• After onboarding: Youll be expected to drive your own progress and propose new content ideas
• Support: Light supervision, regular check-ins, and access to mentors but initiative is key

What Youll Get Hands-On With

Your profile

title: Lead Copywriter, International Creative (m/f/x)
description:
At HelloFresh Group, our mission is to change the way people eat forever. Since our 2011 founding in Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of home cooks across the globe every week. We’ve also launched other exciting brands, including our ready-to-heat subscription service, Factor, which is revolutionizing the category in Europe.

About the job

HelloFresh Group is looking for a powerhouse Lead Copywriter to join our Creative Studio. You’ll bring high-level brand thinking and sharp execution to our creative assets, and you’ll play a role in shaping the voice of our global brands while driving performance across multiple channels.

The role is ideal for a seasoned agency creative looking to move in-house without sacrificing creativity or collaboration. You’ll interpret briefs, pitch ideas, write attention-grabbing copy, and help lead a team of talented local and global writers.

This position is based in Berlin, with mandatory minimum office attendance three days per week, working in our studio in Moabit.

What you’ll do
• Write compelling, on-brand copy for multiple touchpoints and channels, especially TV, OOH, paid social, YouTube, display, and CRM.
• Ideate and conceptualize smart, original campaign ideas based on strategic and creative briefs.
• Collaborate with stakeholders to ensure creative alignment and guarantee effective outcomes.
• Provide clear, constructive feedback to writers across local and global teams.
• Uphold and evolve our tone of voice and messaging guidelines.
• Use generative AI technology for ideation, creation, iteration and integration into our marketing ecosystem.
• Work with designers, videographers, photographers, and motion designers to bring creative ideas to life.
• Rigorously proofread copy, ensuring there are zero typos or grammatical errors.
• Manage content via Google Suite and Jira so that it flows smoothly to stakeholders and translators.

Who we are looking for
• A full-time, Berlin-based copywriter. (HelloFresh Group provides relocation assistance if the successful candidate is not based in Berlin).
• BS/MS from a top-tier university in Communications, Marketing, Creative Writing or another related field of study.
• 8+ years of experience in copywriting or communications, preferably at a top-tier agency.
• A proven track record of writing high-impact, English-language copy across major marketing channels, especially TV, OOH, paid social, YouTube, display, and CRM.
• A strategic thinker who sees the big picture, but also masters the line-by-line details.
• Experience integrating artificial intelligence tools into creative processes, especially engineering prompts to create and iterate content based on briefs, as well as finding efficiencies in the customization and localization of copy for complex audience requirements.
• Experience developing marketing campaigns from brief to ideation to rollout.
• Comfortable working within brand and tone guidelines, but knowing when to push the boundaries.
• Ability to write for multiple projects, markets, languages, and brands simultaneously, changing tone and tactics as needed.
• A curiosity about our audiences, and the ability to interpret performance data to refine copy.
• Experience working for food or tech brands is a plus.
• Experience with the localization processes is a plus.
• Knowledge of German, French, Italian, Spanish, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, or Dutch is a plus.

What we offer

Elevate your lifestyle! Join one of Europe's fastest-growing tech powerhouses in a dynamic phase of expansion.
• Immerse yourself in a diverse global community of 90+ nationalities.
• Enjoy a competitive compensation package that goes beyond the norm, with perks like a HelloFresh- subsidized Pension Scheme, Berlin relocation support, and a Hybrid working model.
• Elevate your lifestyle with exclusive discounts on your weekly HelloFresh box and office meals.
• Invest in your growth with an annual learning & development budget, German language learning budget, and access to the HelloFresh Academy.
• Plus, we've got your well-being covered with mental health support, transportation perks, and working-parent-friendly benefits. From our 24/7 gym access, wellbeing platforms like Headspace and Spill, to sabbatical leave options, HelloFresh is not just a workplace; it's a lifestyle of perks and possibilities!

Are you up for the challenge?

To apply, please complete the application and send us a portfolio of your work for TV, OOH, social media, and any other channels. We’re excited to see what you can bring to the team.

After submitting an application our team will review this and get back to you within 5 business days.

title: AI Content & Copywriting Internship
description:
About M365Connect

We are a fast-growing European startup specializing in Microsoft solutions. Our team is passionate about innovation, collaboration, and building a strong brand presence across digital platforms. We're looking for motivated individuals eager to learn and grow with us!

To expand our brand and accelerate our reach, were launching a remote internship for a motivated AI Content & Copywriting Intern someone eager to learn how to create content that speaks to both Microsoft experts and companies hiring them.

What This Internship Is About

This is not just about writing it's about building content systems. You'll learn how to plan, generate, and scale content using AI tools, collaborate with automation engineers, and simulate processes that will power the content machine of a Microsoft-focused consulting brand.

You'll gain hands-on experience with some of the best tools on the market and be part of shaping M365Connects voice across:
• Blog articles
• Social media
• Lead magnets (whitepapers, slide decks)
• Sales emails
• Website content
• Job postings
• AI-generated visual and video assets

And most importantly you'll be challenged to navigate independently, grow fast, and own your learning path.

️ Structure & Expectations
• Duration: 3-6 months (performance-based)
• Format: Self-paced internship (flexible hours, fully remote)
• Onboarding: You'll get access to our tools, resources, and team for initial orientation
• After onboarding: You'll be expected to drive your own progress and propose new content ideas
• Support: Light supervision, regular check-ins, and access to mentors but initiative is key

What You'll Get Hands-On With
• ChatGPT Pro, Jasper, SurferSEO, Gamma, SlidesAI, Midjourney, Canva, WordPress, and more
• AI prompt engineering for text, image, and video content
• Real-world content workflows: from manual simulation to automation-ready processes
• Cross-functional collaboration with recruiters, tech teams, and designers
• A platform to build a portfolio of content across multiple formats and channels

Topics You'll Explore

For Clients (Hiring Microsoft Experts):
• Hiring the right M365 expert: What to look for
• How to reduce hiring time using AI tools
• Freelance vs. Full-time in the IT hiring world

For Candidates (Microsoft Professionals):

• Building a standout LinkedIn profile as a Microsoft expert
• What to expect in Microsoft role interviews
• Remote contract jobs vs. permanent positions
• How to price yourself as an Azure freelancer

Who We're Looking For

You don't need to be an AI content guru (yet). We're looking for:

Strong fundamentals in writing, research, or tech/recruitment topics
Curious, self-motivated learners who love experimenting with tools
Passion for Microsoft technologies, HR, or digital marketing
Comfortable working independently and building your own structure
Excellent written English
Bonus: Experience with Canva, LinkedIn, Notion, WordPress, or any AI tools

Why This Internship Matters

This is a real opportunity to transition into a full-time role in an AI-driven, remote-first company that is innovating the consulting space. If you can demonstrate value, organize content pipelines, and show that you learn fast you can become a permanent team member.

Learn fast. Think smart. Build with us.
This is your chance to create the future of consulting content.

title: Content & Copywriting Specialist
description:

Content & Copywriting Specialist
to join our team

If you're passionate about crafting compelling messages that resonate with B2B audiences, thrive in a fast-paced SaaS environment, and are fluent in Italian and English, we'd love to hear from you

Please send your
application
and
attach your
CV
to the form.

We'd also love to see your best writing and content creation work For this reason, please send us your
content portfolio
to:
. In the email subject line, please write "Name Surname - Content & Copywriting Specialist Portfolio".

1. The role

As our
Content & Copywriting Specialist
, you will work closely with the Italy Marketing Manager and other teams, while taking ownership of the content creation process for the Italian market, driving engagement and awareness through high-quality, strategically planned content.

You will be responsible for:

and fluent in English

focused on content and copywriting
(B2B experience in SaaS preferred)

3. Nice-to-have

title: Content Copywriter
description:
Digital Freedom Systems vision is to help online business owners to automate their business.

This talented individual will be responsible for developing content in the form of blog posts, articles, landing page content and additional marketing content (email copy, etc.).

The content writer will be an integral part of our overall content marketing efforts to support our local and small business clients.

To be successful in this role, the writer will need to be capable of performing basic research when needed and have the ability to craft engaging content that is industry-specific and tailored to reach specific audiences.

• In-tune with and open to learning more about our overall content marketing efforts to help us provide the best product possible to our clients

The Copywriter responsible for drafting and editing all product copy for online published items. They will ensure the copy is brand appropriate and is in line with the Company’s style, tone and image.

What You’ll Do:

Digital Freedom Systems vision is to help business owners around the world to free up their time by automating their business. We provide end to end solutions from copywriting to web development and marketing.

title: Content Copywriter
description:
The Content Copywriter & Writer will craft persuasive, educational, and SEO-driven content that builds trust, drives conversions, and supports our firm’s mission: helping injury victims, Veterans, and those seeking Social Security Disability benefits nationwide.

You’ll work closely with attorneys, operations leaders, and marketing strategists to develop content that communicates authority, compassion, and credibility while advancing our digital visibility.

Must come from an agency or fast-paced professional environment. Portfolio samples required (proposals, press releases, web/landing pages, branded collateral, blogs, guides, and campaigns).

What You’ll Be Doing
• Write and edit a diverse range of content formats, including:
• Website and landing page copy
• SEO-optimized blog posts and educational guides
• Newsletters, press releases, and case studies
• Social media and email marketing campaigns
• Internal communications, branded materials, and proposals
• Annual reports and long-form thought leadership pieces
• Research and translate complex legal and technical topics (personal injury, Social Security Disability, Veterans’ Disability) into engaging, accessible content.
• Collaborate with attorneys and internal teams to ensure all copy is legally accurate, compliant, and consistent with firm tone.
• Develop templates, frameworks, and style guides for scalable and repeatable content production.
• Apply SEO best practices — including keyword research, metadata, headings, schema, and internal linking — to improve organic visibility.
• Manage multiple projects with competing deadlines while maintaining exceptional quality and attention to detail.
• Stay up-to-date on Google algorithm changes, SEO trends, and content marketing best practices within the legal industry.

What We’re Looking For
Required:
• Minimum 5 years of professional copywriting experience, ideally in an agency, legal, or professional services environment
• Proven SEO writing and editing skills with a keen understanding of on-page optimization
• Portfolio showcasing web content, proposals, campaigns, and branded materials
• Ability to craft clear, persuasive narratives for both B2B and B2C audiences
• Strong command of brand storytelling and the ability to adapt tone for different audiences
• Excellent research and fact-checking skills with the ability to simplify complex legal topics
• Experience using SEO tools such as SEMrush, Ahrefs, or Surfer SEO
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office, Google Workspace, and project management platforms (Asana, Monday.com, etc.)
• Bachelor’s degree in Communications, Marketing, Journalism, English, or a related field

Preferred:
• Experience writing for law firms, legal tech companies, or professional services
• Knowledge of personal injury, Social Security Disability, or Veterans’ benefits
• Familiarity with ethical and compliant legal marketing practices

What We Offer
• Competitive compensation
• Remote work flexibility
• Collaboration with seasoned attorneys, marketers, and legal operations experts
• Ongoing professional development in SEO, content strategy, and legal marketing
• Career growth opportunities within a rapidly expanding national brand
• A mission-driven team dedicated to helping people in need

title: Content & Copywriting
description:
Content & Copywriting Consultant

Role overview

Responsible for creating performance-driving content for both B2B and D2C brands across a variety of digital marketing channels. This is a part-time, contract, fully remote position.

Responsibilities
• Create content strategy and messaging for multiple digital formats, including but not limited to: web content, SEO/long-form articles, SMS, email, social media, blog posts, and white papers
• Work with clients to understand requirements and determine a plan that will ensure performance goals are met or exceeded
• Consider the broader narrative strategy for the brand, and how each piece of content fits inside that structure
• Understand and constantly reference user personas/audience avatars
• Collaborate with stakeholders to create compelling messaging and copy that helps shape a consistent brand experience across all channels
• Clearly present messaging concepts and provide advice and guidance on the tone and voice for campaigns
• Produce clear, concise, error-free content that adheres to style guidelines
• Partner with SEO channel experts on content creation to maximize reach
• Perform background research as needed
• Collaborate and communicate effectively with internal teams and clients

Subject matter requirements
• 5+ years copywriting experience
• Experience producing content in a digital marketing environment
• Strong writing, grammatical, and proofreading skills
• Extensive background working with Fortune 1000 enterprise clients
• Experience leading content-related client communications
• Be familiar with performance marketing KPIs, and unflustered by the need to flex or pivot content based on these data insights
• Prior exposure to working within a startup or small business
• Skilled at aligning expectations across team members and clients
• Passionate about working with people and teams
• Experience working with freelancers and contractors
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
• Proficient with Google Suite and related software

The heart of the matter…

We’re looking for an experienced Digital Copywriter with exceptional writing, communication, and organizational skills. This position will work closely with the Brand and Marketing team to craft copy for our digital mediums: website, long-form, emails, SMS, social media, landing pages, ads, etc. The ideal candidate will have an eye for detail and the ability to write in our clients’ voice while understanding the overall strategy and KPIs for each channel and project. The value delivered in this role is not solely copywriting. We’re looking for a communications expert who thinks critically about each piece through a marketing lens and finds a balance between messaging, KPIs, and maintaining brand voice.

At the end of the day…

More than “just” a copywriter, you’re right for us if you approach content creation with a mix of empathy (listening and understanding), science (research and considered idea distillation), and art (threading a tone to create a heartbeat in the written word).

Sounds like a unicorn? Nope, we believe you’re out there! Apply and let’s talk.

Apply Now

title: Junior Copywriter - Internship

description:

With the merger of VMLY&R and Wunderman Thompson, we have forged a new path as a growth partner that is part creative agency, part consultancy, and part technology powerhouse.

Una mente creativa e la capacità di tradurre strategie complesse in messaggi chiari, persuasivi e memorabili. Cerchiamo una persona curiosa, proattiva e desiderosa di apprendere in un ambiente dinamico e collaborativo.
Si valutano anche candidature di Coppie Creative, Copy + Art.

Cosa Farai con Noi? Le Tue Responsabilità Chiave:Sarai parte integrante del nostro team creativo, contribuendo attivamente allo sviluppo e all'esecuzione di progetti innovativi. Le tue principali attività includeranno:

Collaborazione Interfunzionale: Lavorare a stretto contatto con Art Director, Account per lo sviluppo e l'esecuzione di campagne integrate.
Copywriting Social: Scrivere testi e caption efficaci, dal tono fresco e coinvolgente, adattati a ogni piattaforma e target
Ideazione Contenuti Nativi: Collaborare allo sviluppo di format, idee e iniziative pensate per Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, LinkedIn e altre piattaforme, valorizzando le peculiarità di ciascun canale.
Partecipazione Attiva: Contribuire alle sessioni di brainstorming e supportare la definizione della strategia creativa complessiva.
Qualità e Precisione: Revisionare e correggere i testi per garantire accuratezza, chiarezza e coerenza con il tono di voce del brand.

Cosa Ti Servirà? Le Tue Competenze Essenziali:

Passione Autentica: Forte interesse per il mondo della pubblicità e della comunicazione.
Eccellenza nella Scrittura: Ottime capacità di scrittura, editing e proofreading, con attenzione ai dettagli.
Adattabilità Stilistica: Abilità di adattare lo stile di scrittura a diverse piattaforme, target di riferimento e obiettivi di comunicazione.
Comunicazione Efficace: Spiccate doti comunicative e interpersonali, essenziali per un lavoro di squadra.
Proattività e Autonomia: Capacità di lavorare in modo indipendente e di prendere iniziativa, pur essendo un membro collaborativo del team.
Trend Scouting e Creatività: Monitorare trend, formati e conversazioni sui social, traducendoli in proposte creative e contenuti originali.

Gestione Progetti: Abilità nel gestire più progetti contemporaneamente e rispettare scadenze rigorose.

Perché Scegliere VML Italy?
Entrare in VML Italy significa immergersi in un ambiente stimolante e all'avanguardia, dove la creatività si fonde con l'innovazione tecnologica. Offriamo un'esperienza di stage formativa e professionalizzante, a stretto contatto con alcuni dei migliori talenti del settore, in un contesto internazionale e in continua evoluzione. Avrai l'opportunità di contribuire a progetti di rilievo per brand prestigiosi e di sviluppare competenze chiave per la tua carriera.

Pronto/a a Iniziare il Tuo Percorso in VML?
Se il tuo profilo corrisponde a quanto descritto e sei desideroso/a di intraprendere un'esperienza significativa in una delle agenzie più innovative a livello globale, non esitare a candidarti! Inviaci il tuo CV e, se disponibile, un portfolio o esempi dei tuoi lavori di scrittura.

Candidati Ora e Unisciti al Team di VML Italy!

#LI-EMEAWe believe the best work happens when we're together, fostering creativity, collaboration, and connection. That's why we’ve adopted a hybrid approach, with teams in the office an average of four days a week. If you require accommodations or flexibility, please discuss this with the hiring team during the interview process.
WPP (VML) is an equal opportunity employer and considers applicants for all positions without discrimination or regard to characteristics. We are committed to fostering a culture of respect in which everyone feels they belong and has the same opportunities to progress in their careers.
VML is a WPP Agency. For more information, please visit our website, and follow VML on our social channels via Instagram, LinkedIn, and X.
When you click "Submit Application", this will send any information you add below to VML. Before you do this, we think it's a good idea to read through our Recruitment Privacy Policy. California residents should read our California Recruitment Privacy Notice. This explains what we do with your personal data when you apply for a role with us, and, how you can update the information you have provided us with or how to remove it.

title: Copywriter and Content Manager
description:
Descrizione azienda

Alpinestars is the leading global performance motorsports apparel, protection and footwear manufacturer. For over 60 years the company has been providing the world’s best athletes and motorsports enthusiasts in the pursuit of performance excellence with the most technologically advanced products which fuse protection, innovation and style.

The company, thanks to outstanding and constantly innovative products, is in a powerful growth phase in the global market, reflecting the strengthening of the staff in order to join our great successful team.

Now we are looking for highy skilled Copywriter and Content Manager to join our dynamic team and support our expanding e-commerce business, performance marketing initiatives, social media channels, and overall media presence.

The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of and a genuine passion for motorsport, motorcycling, and the Alpinestars brand.

(S)he will play a key role in crafting compelling copy, developing engaging content, and maintaining the brand voice across various platforms.

Posizione
• Write clear, compelling, and on-brand copy for product descriptions, marketing materials, website content, and other e-commerce assets.
• Develop engaging and innovative content for social media platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
• Collaborate with the marketing and design teams to create captivating visuals and graphics that complement written content.
• Manage content calendars and schedules to ensure timely delivery of content across all channels.
• Stay up-to-date with industry trends, motorsport events, and product launches to generate relevant and timely content.
• Optimize content for SEO to improve search engine rankings and drive organic traffic.
• Monitor and analyze content performance metrics to identify areas for improvement and inform future content strategies.
• Uphold brand guidelines and ensure consistency in messaging and tone of voice across all communication channels.

Requisiti
• Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, or related field.
• Minimum of 5 years of experience in copywriting, content creation, or a related role, preferably in the motorsport industry.
• Native-level proficiency in English with exceptional writing and editing skills.
• Deep knowledge and passion for motorsport, motorcycling, and the Alpinestars brand.
• Proven track record of creating engaging and effective content for e-commerce, social media, and marketing campaigns.
• Strong understanding of SEO principles and best practices.
• Proficiency in content management systems (CMS) and social media management tools.
• Excellent organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.
• Creative thinker with a keen eye for detail and design aesthetics.
• Team player with strong communication and collaboration skills.

Altre informazioni

Join us at Alpinestars and be part of a passionate team dedicated to delivering top-notch products and experiences to motorsport enthusiasts worldwide.

This position is available in Asolo (TV) - Italy.

title: Junior Copywriter
description:
The Bloc is the most diversified, fully independent health creative agency in the world. We provide comprehensive cross-channel services for audiences across the health spectrum, and partner with clients who are doing some of the most meaningful and exciting work in health today. And as part of an international network of like-minded, independent agencies across the globe, our work continues to be globally recognized for creativity and innovation. Come build with us!

Responsabilities :
• Proposing copy concepts in an engaging way for clients and carrying out projects once they are approved
• Ensure consistent messaging and tone of voice across channels
• Conduct research to understand audiences, industry trends, and competitors
• Participate in creative meetings and contribute ideas for campaign concepts
• Collaborate with art directors to ensure copy and visuals work together seamlessly
• Stay updated on copywriting best practices, marketing trends, and emerging communication tools
• Turn scientific information into engaging content for a wide audience

Requirements :
• Bachelor’s degree in marketing, Communications, Journalism, or related field
• At least 1-2 years of proven experience as a copywriter or content writer (in health sector will be a plus)
• Understanding of digital marketing principles and social media platforms.
• Experience producing content for multimedia such as podcasts or video scripts will be a plus
• Excellent writing skills
• Ability to work under tight deadlines
• Strong research skills and attention to detail
• Italian mother tongue
• Italian and English

Do you have the skills, experience and personal qualities we at The Bloc are looking for? please apply now!

The Bloc provides equal employment opportunity to all individuals regardless of their race, color, creed, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, or any other characteristic protected by law.

title: Content & Copywriting Specialist
location: Milan, Metropolitan City of Milan, Italy
description:
Italy Content & Copywriting Specialist

As the Italy marketing team continues to grow, we are looking for a talented
Content & Copywriting Specialist
to join our team

This is a full-time role focused on content creation, storytelling, and strategic copywriting across various platforms and formats. If you're passionate about crafting compelling messages that resonate with B2B audiences, thrive in a fast-paced SaaS environment, and are fluent in Italian and English, we'd love to hear from you

Application requirements

Please send your
application
and
attach your
CV
to the form.

We'd also love to see your best writing and content creation work For this reason, please send us your
content portfolio
to:

. In the email subject line, please write "Name Surname - Content & Copywriting Specialist Portfolio".

1. The role

As our
Content & Copywriting Specialist
, you will work closely with the Italy Marketing Manager and other teams, while taking ownership of the content creation process for the Italian market, driving engagement and awareness through high-quality, strategically planned content.

You will be responsible for:
• Editorial ownership
: manage and execute the editorial calendar for the Odoo blog and social media, from topic ideation to publication.
• Content creation
: write and publish various content types, including blog articles, customer success stories, social media posts, newsletters, OOH and performance marketing ad copy, and video scripts (webinars, social content etc), ensuring alignment with campaign goals and brand voice.
• SEO & keyword research
: conduct keyword research to identify high-impact topics and optimize content for both SEO and SEM.
• Gated content
: plan, create, and distribute premium gated content such as white papers, ebooks, sales enablement materials, and marketing collateral.
• Campaign alignment
: collaborate cross-functionally with internal teams (marketing, product, sales etc) to align messaging with ongoing GTM and product initiatives.
• Performance monitoring
: analyze content performance, gather insights and data to continuously improve content impact.

2. Must-have
• Native Italian speaker
and fluent in English
• Minimum 2 years of professional experience
focused on content and copywriting
(B2B experience in SaaS preferred)
• Strong creativity, storytelling and copywriting skills
• Proven ability to write both brand-driven and conversion-focused content
• Experience with SEO, keyword research, and content optimization tools
• Comfortable producing content such as: ebooks, white papers, case studies, etc.
• Collaborative and organized, with the ability to work independently and cross-functionally
• Strong project management skills
• Analytical mindset: ability to track, report, and optimize content performance

3. Nice-to-have
• Previous experience in a SaaS company
• Understanding of B2B buyer personas and sales enablement needs
• Basic knowledge of video editing or multimedia storytelling
• Familiarity with Google ads, paid social, and performance marketing best practices
• Ability to create simple designs on Canva
• Understanding of social media (especially LinkedIn) content strategy
• Experience working cross-functionally in multilingual or international marketing teams

Hiring process

Here's what you can expect:
• CV screening
• Introductory interview
with our Talent Acquisition team
• At-home business case
• Interview
with the hiring manager (Italy Marketing Manager)
• Final interview
with the hiring manager and the Italy Managing Director

Remote Content Writer (Copywriter)

description:

CRH (China Resources Holdings) has announced an opening for the position of Remote Content Writer (Copywriter), listed on Indeed. This is a fully remote position that allows you to work from anywhere, providing flexibility and work-life balance while contributing to meaningful projects.

They craft persuasive and engaging messages that resonate with target audiences. Copywriting Content creation SEO Marketing strategies Creativity. Work from anywhere flexibility
No daily commute

Opportunity to work with diverse teams across locations

title: Creative Marketing & Content Director (Copywriter)
description: Director of Marketing & CreativeThe Director of Marketing & Creative is the architect behind our brand growth, content systems, and campaign performance.You will own the strategy and execution of all marketing efforts — across paid media, funnels, content, blogs, email, and YouTube — while l...

title: Content Writer / Copywriter
description:
Job Title: Content Writer / Copywriter
Position Type: Full-Time, Remote
Working Hours: U.S. client business hours (with flexibility for deadlines and content calendars)

About the Role:
Our client is seeking a Content Writer / Copywriter to create compelling, high-quality content that informs, engages, and converts. This role involves producing blog posts, landing pages, ad copy, sales collateral, and thought leadership content. The Writer ensures all outputs are on-brand, SEO-friendly, and aligned with marketing and sales objectives.

Responsibilities:
• Content Creation:
• Write long-form and short-form content including blogs, case studies, whitepapers, newsletters, and web pages.
• Produce copy for ads, email campaigns, and sales collateral.
• Ensure all content aligns with brand voice, style, and tone.
• SEO & Optimization:
• Research keywords and incorporate SEO best practices into writing.
• Collaborate with SEO specialists to optimize for search intent and ranking.
• Update existing content to maintain freshness and relevance.
• Research & Subject Expertise:
• Conduct in-depth research on industry topics, competitors, and trends.
• Interview subject matter experts (SMEs) for thought leadership content.
• Translate complex topics into clear, engaging copy.
• Editing & Quality Assurance:
• Proofread for grammar, clarity, and consistency.
• Ensure deliverables are accurate, plagiarism-free, and error-free.
• Maintain content calendars and deliver work on time.
• Collaboration:
• Work with designers, marketers, and sales teams to align copy with visuals and campaigns.
• Incorporate stakeholder feedback into revisions while maintaining brand integrity.
• Performance Tracking:
• Monitor content performance using Google Analytics, HubSpot, or similar tools.
• Provide recommendations to improve engagement, conversions, and SEO rankings.

What Makes You a Perfect Fit:
• Strong storyteller with a flair for persuasive and engaging writing.
• Skilled at tailoring tone and style for different audiences and formats.
• Organized multitasker who can manage multiple assignments and deadlines.
• Curious researcher who thrives on learning new industries and topics.

Required Experience & Skills (Minimum):
• 2+ years professional writing or copywriting experience.
• Portfolio of content across multiple formats (blogs, web copy, ads, collateral).
• Proficiency with Microsoft Office/Google Workspace.
• Strong research and editing skills.

Ideal Experience & Skills:
• Background writing for B2B SaaS, marketing agencies, or professional services.
• Familiarity with SEO tools (SEMrush, Ahrefs, Clearscope).
• Experience writing conversion-focused copy (ads, landing pages, email sequences).
• Knowledge of content management systems (WordPress, HubSpot).

What Does a Typical Day Look Like?
A Content Writer / Copywriter’s day revolves around producing high-quality, conversion-focused content. You will:
• Research industry trends and gather insights for upcoming topics.
• Draft blog posts and long-form content for marketing campaigns.
• Write ad copy, landing page text, or sales collateral to support lead generation and deals.
• Collaborate with designers and marketers to align copy with visuals and campaign strategy.
• Edit and proof content for accuracy and brand consistency.
• Track content performance and optimize older pieces for better SEO and conversions.

In essence: you ensure content is persuasive, optimized, and impactful, fueling marketing and sales results.

Key Metrics for Success (KPIs):
• Consistent content delivery aligned with deadlines.
• Growth in organic traffic and engagement from written content.
• Conversion performance of landing pages and ad copy.
• SEO rankings and visibility for target keywords.
• Positive stakeholder feedback on clarity and effectiveness of content.

Interview Process:
• Initial Phone Screen
• Video Interview with Pavago Recruiter
• Portfolio Review + Practical Task (e.g., draft a blog intro and ad copy for a sample product)
• Client Interview with Marketing Leadership
• Offer & Background Verification

title: Strategic Content Writer (Xico)
description:
Who We AreWe are a high-growth marketing agency obsessed with delivering measurable results for our clients.
Our growth isn't accidental; it's the direct result of a team of dedicated practitioners who thrive on complex challenges and drive tangible outcomes.
We operate with a high degree of autonomy and accountability, and we believe that the best ideas, backed by data, are the ones that win.
Our culture is built on intellectual rigor, radical ownership, and a shared commitment to excellence.The Opportunity: More Than a WriterThis is not a typical content-churn position.
We are looking for a strategic thinker who writes, not just a writer who understands strategy.
You will be the critical link between data-driven insights and the compelling narratives that convert.
Your primary mission will be to develop and execute content strategies across Local SEO, PPC, and Email Marketing that don't just read well, but perform exceptionally.You will have a seat at the table, contributing to high-level strategy and using your unique blend of analytical and creative skills to solve our clients' most pressing growth challenges.What You'll Do: ResponsibilitiesDevelop & Execute Hyper-Local SEO Strategies: Go beyond keyword stuffing.
You will build content strategies for local clients that dominate map packs and local search.
This includes crafting optimized service pages, location pages, Google Business Profile posts, and citation-worthy content that search engines and users love.Craft High-Conversion PPC & Ad Copy: Write compelling, direct-response copy for Google Ads, social media ads, and landing pages.
You will be expected to understand the nuances of different platforms, A/B test your hypotheses, and relentlessly optimize for lower CPAs and higher conversion rates.Architect Strategic Email Marketing Campaigns: Design and write email sequences for various goals: lead nurturing, client onboarding, re-engagement, and direct sales.
Your writing will guide users through the funnel, building trust and driving action at every step.Conduct UX & Conversion Copywriting Audits: Analyze client websites, landing pages, and funnels with a critical eye.
You'll provide actionable recommendations from both a visual hierarchy and copywriting perspective to improve user experience and increase conversion rates.Analyze, Report & Iterate: You are expected to close the loop.
You will dive into analytics (Google Analytics, SEMrush, etc.) to understand the impact of your work, report on performance, and use that data to inform your next strategic move.Who You Are: The Ideal Candidate's ProfileWe are looking for a specific type of professional.
You likely have:Proven Track Record: 3-5+ years of experience in a strategic content role, preferably within an agency setting.
You have a portfolio that clearly demonstrates your direct impact on lead generation, sales, and user engagement across SEO, PPC, and Email.Exceptional English Proficiency: A complete, professional-level command of the English language (specifically American English) is essential for crafting nuanced, high-conversion copy.Master of Local SEO: You can speak fluently about the local algorithm, citation building, NAP consistency, and how to craft content that earns local authority.A/B Testing Mindset: You see copy as a series of experiments.
You are comfortable with data and use it to validate your creative instincts.UX Empathy: You naturally see a webpage through a user's eyes.
You can articulate why a button is in the wrong place, why a headline is confusing, or why the flow of a page is breaking trust.Intellectual Horsepower & Grit: You don't just identify problems; you build and test solutions.
When faced with a complex challenge or an underperforming campaign, you get energized, not discouraged.High Accountability: You have a deep sense of personal ownership over your work and its outcomes.
You're resilient and view critical feedback as an essential tool for growth.Obsessed with Closing the Loop: You have an insatiable need to know if your work worked.
The idea of launching a campaign and not obsessively checking its performance is foreign to you.A Note on Our Demands & Your RewardsLet's be transparent: the expectations here are exceptionally high.
This role demands a significant investment of your time, energy, and intellectual horsepower.
It requires resilience and a proactive, problem-solving mindset that goes far beyond a 9-to-5 checklist.This role is not for everyone.However, for the right person, the rewards are immense.
You are not a cog in a machine here.
You are a critical driver of our clients' success and our agency's growth.
You will be challenged, you will grow faster than you thought possible, and you will see the direct, tangible impact of your strategic work every single day.
If you are a builder who is energized by that level of responsibility and impact, you will thrive here.What We OfferCompetitive salary commensurate with your experience and impact; $2,000–$4,000 USD/month.A competitive benefits package (details may vary based on your location).
Generous Paid Time Off (PTO) and company holidays.A fully remote and adaptable work environment.A dedicated budget for professional development, courses, and conferences.The opportunity to shape the trajectory of a rapidly growing agency.How to ApplyIf this sounds like the challenge you've been looking for, please submit your resume and a link to your portfolio.In your application, please also include a brief cover letter that specifically answers the following question:Tell us about a single campaign or piece of content you worked on that you are particularly proud of.
Briefly explain the initial problem, your strategic approach, and the measurable results.Please also note your primary working timezone and your general availability for collaboration during US Eastern Time (ET) business hours.We look forward to hearing from you.
#J-*****-Ljbffr

title: Associate Creative Director (Copywriter)
description:
Please note that we will never request payment or bank account information at any stage of the recruitment process. As we continue to grow our teams, we urge you to be cautious of fraudulent job postings or recruitment activities that misuse our company name and information. Please protect your personal information during any recruitment process. While Monks may contact potential candidates via LinkedIn, all applications must be submitted through our official website (monks.com/careers).

Monks is looking for a well rounded, experienced Associate Creative Director with an copywriting background ready to get their hands dirty, lead projects, concept, and pitch for one of the world’s most beloved brands in our Mexico City office.

Role & Responsibilities
• Working as part of a dedicated unit within Monks, you’ll be in a unique position to lead creative processes and pitches across the entire account, taking on campaigns and projects big and small.
• You will partner with your creative counterparts to direct creative, design and concepts across teams and time zones.
• You’ll be presenting to the client in person and through video calls, pitching new projects and proposals for production.
• From establishing brand worlds to defining the concepts and copys for interactive campaigns, websites, content and social media, you will be responsible for the conception, creation and execution of high-stakes projects.
• You go above and beyond the original brief to push what’s possible on both a creative and technical level, even under tight deadlines.
• You’ll translate briefs from various clients into digestible roadmaps for creative exploration.
• Combining creative art direction with critical thinking; your analytical approach enables you to ask the right questions and waterproof ideas from both a strategic and conceptual perspective.
• You’ll produce creative proposals, mockups and decks to kickstart new campaigns.
• You help to make sure all work is conceptually in line with the campaign’s objectives and client expectations.

Requirements
• For this lead position, we’re looking for an Associate Creative Director with 6-8 years of professional experience, with 2+ years of high-level experience, leading creative teams in an advertising or production agency setting.
• While we are looking for a candidate with strong roots in copywriting, our ideal unicorn candidate also has a strong background and eye for concept creating and copy.
• You’re able to present a portfolio of praise-worthy projects, showcasing your understanding of innovative tech trends, PR-able ideas, and campaigns.
• You can successfully ideate and pitch your ideas in a digestible, understandable format.
• As part of a constructive feedback loop, you can give and handle criticism without making or taking it personally, eagerly going the extra mile if that’s what it takes to make good great.
• You are humble enough to always listen and learn from clients and teammates.
• You know how to empower and lead without a show of force, giving our in-house teams a clear creative direction and ownership over their projects.
• As part of a global company operating as one team across time zones, you can successfully collaborate at a distance.
• You know how to maintain a positive vibe and inspire people to get things done, wherever they are in the world.
• You have the ability and stamina to tackle the same challenge from a wide variety of angles.
• You can produce concepts from scratch and enhance ideas provided by clients and colleagues.
• You’re a team player with leadership skills: you can keep a cool head when things get heated and are great at dealing with (stressed-out) clients and coworkers.
• You know how to maintain a positive vibe and inspire people to get things done, wherever they are in the world.
• Advanced English

#LI-DC1

About Monks

Monks is the global, purely digital, unitary operating brand of S4Capital plc. With a legacy of innovation and specialized expertise, Monks combines an extraordinary range of global marketing and technology services to accelerate business possibilities and redefine how brands and businesses interact with the world. Its integration of systems and workflows delivers unfettered content production, scaled experiences, enterprise-grade technology and data science fueled by AI—managed by the industry’s best and most diverse digital talent—to help the world’s trailblazing companies outmaneuver and outpace their competition.

Monks was named a Contender in The Forrester Wave™: Global Marketing Services. It has remained a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-23), ranks among Cannes Lions' Top 10 Creative Companies (2022-23) and is the only partner to have been placed in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players list every year (2020-24). In addition to being named Adweek’s first AI Agency of the Year (2023), Monks has been recognized by Business Intelligence in its 2024 Excellence in Artificial Intelligence Awards program in three categories: the Individual category, Organizational Winner in AI Strategic Planning and AI Product for its service Monks.Flow. Monks has also garnered the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-24), won a record number of FWAs and has earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023.

We are an equal-opportunity employer committed to building a respectful and empowering work environment for all people to freely express themselves amongst colleagues who embrace diversity in all respects. Including fresh voices and unique points of view in all aspects of our business not only creates an environment where we can all grow and thrive but also increases our potential to produce work that better represents—and resonates with—the world around us.

title: Copywriting Intern
description:
About the MOI Academy Internship

At MOI Global, we don’t believe in token internships or week-long placements. We’re a forward-thinking B2B creative agency that invests in the next generation of talent. Our MOI Academy internship programme is a 6–12 months immersive experience – a launchpad for your marketing career. This isn’t about getting your foot in the door for a moment; it’s about finding your feet and growing with us for the long run. With a placement this substantial, you’ll have time to truly immerse yourself in the industry, develop real skills, and even open the door to a permanent role. It’s a transformative journey for interns who are serious about a career in marketing.

During your internship, you won’t just be working for us – you’ll be working with us. From day one, you’ll be an embedded member of our team, sharing in the creative brainstorms, tight deadlines, big wins, and learning experiences. We laugh together, sweat together (and maybe even shed the occasional tear together), just like any other team member tackling real projects. You’ll contribute meaningfully to our agency’s work and culture, making a real difference for both our team and our clients. In fact, MOI Academy interns get to work on real campaigns for real clients – including global tech brands you know and love. This is not a coffee-run kind of internship; this is a chance to roll up your sleeves and do work that matters in the B2B marketing world.
The Role

We’re on the hunt for a passionate, creative Copywriting Intern to join our vibrant marketing team in Singapore. This is your chance to hone your craft and contribute directly to projects that drive our brand’s success. You’ll be given responsibility (and guidance) to develop copy that captivates audiences and brings ideas to life. At MOI, we break the B2B mould – and as a copywriting intern, you’ll help us do just that with the power of words. This isn’t about shadowing in the background; you’ll create content that we’ll proudly put front and centre. Your words will help attract new customers, tell the MOI story, and deliver results for our campaigns.

As a Copywriting Intern, you will gain experience crafting engaging and persuasive copy across a variety of channels and formats, including:
• Websites: Write and update website content and landing pages with copy that hooks and informs.
• Social Media: Craft catchy social posts, captions, and ad copy that spark conversation and engagement.
• Email Campaigns: Develop email newsletters and campaign emails that our audiences want to open and act on.
• Blogs & Articles: Research and write insightful blog posts and articles that showcase thought leadership and creativity.
• And more: Basically, wherever there’s a need for a compelling narrative – from case studies and brochures to video script snippets – you’ll be there to lend your voice.

Throughout the internship, you’ll work closely with our experienced copywriters, designers, and strategists, learning how to adapt your writing to different mediums and client industries. One day you might be brainstorming taglines for a social campaign; the next, polishing a blog article or tweaking website copy for SEO. It’s a fast-paced, dynamic role where no two days are the same, and that’s all part of the fun!
What You’ll Gain

This isn’t just “resume filler” – it’s a true learning opportunity that will kickstart your career. Here’s what you can expect to get out of the MOI Academy copywriting internship:
• Real-world Experience: Hands-on involvement in a fast-paced B2B marketing agency environment. You’ll be doing real work on live campaigns, not making tea.
• Mentorship & Training: One-on-one guidance from seasoned copywriters and marketing pros. They’ll coach you, give feedback on your work, and help you sharpen your writing and creative thinking skills.
• Portfolio Development: A chance to build a portfolio of published work – from social posts and articles to web content – that you can proudly show future employers. Nothing beats saying “I wrote this” about content actually out in the world.
• Industry Exposure: Experience the ins and outs of modern B2B marketing. You’ll gain insight into multi-channel campaigns, learn about agency life, and even work on campaigns for well-known global tech brands, giving you a broad perspective on the industry.
• Career Opportunities: By the end of your 6–12 months with us, you won’t be a beginner anymore. High-performing interns may transition into full-time roles with MOI Global – we view our internship as a pipeline for future talent. (In fact, many of our past interns are now permanent team members!)
• Team Culture & Networks: Immerse yourself in an energetic, creative team that values ideas and initiative. You’ll make professional connections (and great friends) and experience an agency culture that’s collaborative, inclusive, and fun.
Who We’re Looking For

We welcome current students as well as recent graduates who are excited to dive into copywriting and marketing. The ideal candidate will tick many of these boxes:
• Education: You are currently pursuing or have recently completed a Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, English, or a related field.
• Writing Prowess: You have a strong command of the English language (British English fluency is a plus) with excellent grammar, and you love writing. Whether it’s a snappy tagline or a long-form article, you take pride in crafting clear, creative content.
• Creative Mindset: Imaginative and forward-thinking, you’re brimming with fresh ideas. You aren’t afraid to think outside the box and experiment with new angles or storytelling techniques in your copy.
• Keen to Learn: A quick learner who’s eager to absorb everything about marketing and brand storytelling. You ask questions, seek feedback, and continuously refine your skills.
• Digital Savvy: Familiar with digital marketing channels and content formats – including social media platforms, email marketing, blogs/SEO, and maybe even a bit of video or multimedia content. (You know how different channels require different tones and approaches.)
• Research & Adaptability: Excellent research skills with the ability to gather information on unfamiliar topics quickly. You can adapt your writing style to suit different audiences and industries, from tech-savvy decision makers to general readers.
• Organised & Reliable: Able to juggle multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. You stay organised, pay attention to detail (your spelling and punctuation are always on point), and can handle feedback and revisions with a positive attitude.
• Team Player: Great communication skills and a collaborative spirit. You can work well with designers, marketers, and other writers, and you’re happy to share ideas and also take direction when needed.
• Passion for Marketing: You’re genuinely interested in the world of marketing and advertising, especially B2B marketing. You’re the type of person who wants to know what makes audiences tick and how great campaigns are put together.
• Bonus Points: If you have knowledge of analytics or content performance tools (e.g. Google Analytics, social media insights) – that’s a plus. It shows you’re interested in how creative content performs and how to make it even better.
About MOI

MOI Global is the world’s leading multi-specialist B2B marketing agency, with a footprint across London, New York, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Munich, and Sydney.

We’re proud to be recognised as Best Agency of the Year (B2B Marketing Awards 2022) and a Best Company to Work For (Best Companies). But beyond the awards, our mission remains clear: to redefine the business of creativity and make B2B experiences braver, smarter, and more human.

At MOI, we embrace what’s different and challenge what’s expected. Through our proprietary Turning Heads™methodology, we combine strategic consulting, bold creative thinking, media expertise, cutting-edge technology, and sales insight to deliver intelligent, head-turning solutions that help our clients differentiate, transform, and grow.

It’s why some of the world’s most ambitious tech brands—including Adobe, Ciena, Dropbox, Meta (Facebook), AWS, Google Cloud, Oracle, ServiceNow, and Proofpoint—trust us to turn the heads that matter most.
• Turning Heads™ is more than a promise. It’s our method for generating big ideas that translate seamlessly across every channel, format, and stage of the customer journey—ideas that inspire creative work with real impact, not just noise.

Equal Opportunities

At MOI, we’re passionate about building a workplace where everyone belongs and every voice is heard. We know that diversity fuels creativity—and in turn, creativity drives everything we do.

We are proud to be an equal opportunities employer. We welcome applications from all backgrounds and actively encourage people from underrepresented communities to apply. Your age, ethnicity, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other characteristic will never affect your opportunity with us. What matters is your talent, curiosity, and drive.

We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for applicants with disabilities at every stage of the recruitment process. If you need any adjustments or support during the application or interview process, simply let us know when applying—we’re here to help.

Turn our heads

If you’re serious about building a long-term career in marketing and want a chance to show what you can do, this is your opportunity.

Turn our heads: show us why you’re the person to help turn the heads that count in B2B.

Send us your CV, a cover letter, and any portfolio samples you have. Be bold. Be brave. And above all—don’t be afraid to let your personality shine through.

Note: This is a paid internship.

Job Description

Are you a wordsmith with a passion for digital storytelling?

We're looking for a Copywriting Intern at Creative For More who can turn ideas into impactful content across multiple platforms. You'll craft everything from SEO-optimised blogs to engaging email campaigns while learning the strategy behind successful digital marketing. If you're studying Marketing, Communications, or English and ready to put your writing skills to work in a dynamic environment, with potential for full-time opportunities, we want to hear from you!

Responsibilities

Research and Development:

Diverse Content Formats:

Proposal Creation:

• Ensure proposals align strategically with client objectives and effectively showcase our agency's capabilities.

Content Planning:
• Assist in developing content plans for both organic and client channels as required.
• Create high-quality content that resonates with target audiences and adheres to brand guidelines.

Team Collaboration:
• Participate actively in team meetings to brainstorm ideas, discuss project updates, and strategise on upcoming initiatives.
• Engage in client meetings to understand their needs better, provide insights, and present content proposals.

Learning Opportunities:
• Gain hands-on experience in digital content creation across multiple platforms.
• Develop a solid understanding of digital marketing strategies, including SEO, content marketing, and email marketing.
• Enhance your research, writing, and collaborative skills in a professional setting.

Requirements:

Fast Self-Learner:
• Ability to quickly grasp new concepts, tools, and industry trends to adapt to the fast-paced nature of digital marketing.

Strong Articulation Skills:
• Strong communication skills to articulate ideas clearly, present proposals confidently with the team

Proactive and a Team Player:
• You must be proactive in seeking opportunities, contributing ideas, and collaborating effectively with team members.
• A team player who can thrive in a collaborative environment.

Qualifications:
• Current enrollment in or recent graduation from a program in Marketing, Communications, English, Journalism, or a related field.
• Strong writing and editing skills, with attention to detail.
• Basic understanding of SEO and digital marketing strategies.
• Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.
• Strong organisational skills and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Join our team and be part of an exciting journey in the digital marketing landscape. If you are passionate about creating compelling content, thrive in a collaborative environment, and are ready to make an impact, we'd love to hear from you.

Working Hours

title: Senior Copywriter - English - AI Focused
description:
Company description

Saatchi & Saatchi is a leading global communications and advertising network known for its impactful creative ideas that generate powerful emotional connections between consumers and brands. Present in over 67 countries, Saatchi & Saatchi employs 6,500 professionals over 114 offices. Global clients include HSBC, P&G, Toyota, Visa and GSK. Saatchi & Saatchi is part of Publicis Communications a key division of Publicis Groupe, the world’s third largest communications group.

Overview

This position is for a specialized AI unit that generated full or integrated AI work.

As a Senior Copywriter, you will contribute to the development of big ideas while bringing campaigns to life through exceptional verbal communication. You will be responsible for conceptualising, writing, producing, and directing brand and campaign solutions for all levels of creative and marketing projects.

The talent should be quite familiar with generative AI tools, especially the text and copy related ones.

Responsibilities

Key Responsibilities:

Deliver strategically sound conceptual thinking and high-quality copywriting across all the brand’s channels, including print, ecommerce, digital, social media, product, naming, among others.

Provide new creative thinking and high-level storytelling across all agency needs, including integrated campaigns, print ads, mailers, postcards, website assets, landing pages, emails, digital banners, social media, etc.

Effectively present your own ideas and rationale for writing, concepts, and creative in an effective and persuasive manner, both internally and externally.

Demonstrate organized thinking by arranging work into presentations that communicate information effectively and efficiently.

Consult with the ECD, Creative Director, as well as ACD, Art Directors, production, and marketing team as necessary to achieve brand/marketing objectives.

Develop verbal campaign elements using scripts, headlines, copy, etc.

Use AI to generate full or elevated copy

Brainstorm ideas with other creative team to assist in creating and developing concepts.

Provide creative ideas that fit clients’ needs.

Develop an understanding of clients’ business, brands, and consumers

Main Tasks

Technical & Product

Content Development: Create persuasive and engaging copy for technical and product-focused campaigns, including digital ads, print ads, web content, email marketing, social media, and product descriptions.

Creative Ideation: Collaborate with the AI team members to brainstorm and develop innovative ideas that effectively communicate product features and benefits.

Brand Voice: Maintain and develop a consistent brand voice across all content, ensuring alignment with brand guidelines and tone.

Editing and Proofreading: Review and edit copy to ensure accuracy, clarity, and consistency. Ensure all content is free of grammatical and spelling errors.

Use AI to generate and perfect final output.

Business Acumen & Operational Efficiency

Ability to meet all required deadlines, both internal and external, with minimal supervision.

Must have experience working in a creative team environment.

Ability to work collaborate and advise on the overall creative ouput

Ability to present one’s own work successfully internally and externally

Exhibits a fun-loving attitude and pride in the process of making and selling great work.

Innovative & Analytical Mindset

Conduct basic research to stay up to date with the latest communication and AI trends

Qualifications

5-7 years of related professional experience in the marketing/creative industry.

Online portfolio that demonstrates your storytelling, copywriting, and conceptual thinking abilities.

Additional information

P-3414
